posts.title: New Release: Marriage Suite
posts.content: Excited to announce the completion of my latest work, Marriage Suite for string quartet. This multi-movement piece explores themes of love and celebration.

posts.title: NYC Symposium Recognition
posts.content: Honored to have Sonata No. 1 selected as a semi-finalist at the NYC Contemporary Music Symposium 2023.

posts.title: New Game Music Pack: surpass your limits!
posts.content: Just released a new free music pack on itch.io! 13 tracks of high-energy action music for your games.
